LOGIN: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} logged in at {{timeStamp}}
LOGOUT: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} logged out at {{timeStamp}}
CREATE_USER: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} created
UPDATE_USER: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} updated
DELETE_USER: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} deleted
VIEW_PROJECT: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} viewed project '{{projectName}}' with ID {{projectID}}
VIEW_USER: User with ID {{userID}} and Username {{username}} viewed user with ID {{viewedUserID}} and Username {{viewedUsername}}
